text: <@U038V0M6GE9>  i can help you with new website

Hi nice to meet you.
I am a Senior Software Engineer who specializes in React/Redux, Vue.js FE development and Node.js, Laravel, Ruby on Rails BE development.
can you please let me know any job opportunity for me to work full-time?
I am sure I could be an immediate, valuable asset for the success of your project, your team and your business.
